TopicTitle: What do you call the sun in Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
You know, this is the moment when I really wonder about people. Kerbol? Why? That has got to the like the dumbest name I ever heard for a star and not sure why anyone would call it that. Kerbals are the species and calling the planet Kerbin makes sense. You know like if you are from america, you are american. We call are star "the sun", not earthol, or humanol, or anything stupid like that.

I will call it the sun till an official name that makes sense is used. Something that is less confusing.

I am just shocked so many people actually call it that o.o, sorry if i sound like a jerk .. but ... dang .. really?

Do you really think people are going to confuse a star with a species? If someone says "I just entered Kerbol SOI" do you really think someone is going to say "wait, the star or Jeb?" I've never seen anyone get confused when referring to the sun as Kerbol.

Nice try, but your sentences actually back up my claim rather than yours:

"Do you know what a Kerbol is?" - You're obviously talking about a kerbal because Kerbol is a proper noun. You wouldn't say "Do you know what a Brabbit1987 is?" or "Do you know what a Jane is?" would you? No.

"Oh look at that Kerbal!" - Same thing. You would say "Oh look at Kerbol!" if you're talking about the star. "Oh look at that Kerbal!" obviously refers to the species.

It's all about context. If that doesn't make sense to you, then there's little help for you.

I find Kerbol fitting. The Kerbals are obviously a slightly Narcissistic species more so than our own. They call their planet Kerbin, after themselves. We; Humans, call our planet Earth. The Kerbals also would've seen the sun way before anything else as it was and is the brightest thing in the sky for them so naturally, they named it after themselves too. We didn't we call the star which we orbit around "Sol" or more commonly "the sun"

We can find that it still makes sense to call the sun of the Kerbals "Kerbol" because wouldn't it be silly if we called, oh let's say our sun, "The Sol"? or if we called Proxima Centauri "The Proxima Centauri" or if we called Gleise-581 "The Gleise-581"?

The further I go on the more sense to makes to call the Kerbal's star "Kerbol" or our star "Sol"
